effect.short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.

flavorTexts.text:
The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified cheeks
against the target. This also leaves the target
with paralysis.
